description:

The video, which actually features an animated teaser poster for the movie, is accompanied by the iconic “All Star” [...]

description:

description:
She-Hulk star Tatiana Maslany has made her stance very clear about children being able to use their preferred pronouns at school without their parents’ permission. As shared below, she commented on a new law that went into effect in Saskatchewan, Canada. The law, as described via The Independent, “requires school staff to obtain parental consent [...]

The post ‘She-Hulk’ Star Tatiana Maslany Blasts New Law On Parental Approval Of Preferred Pronouns As “Absurd” appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘She-Hulk’ Star Tatiana Maslany Blasts New Law On Parental Approval Of Preferred Pronouns As “Absurd”
